mapper.select: select ttr.trip_id, tr.stop_id, ss.stop_name, ss.stop_desc, ss.stop_lon, ss.stop_lat, ss.start_date, ss.end_date, cast(tr.stop_sequence as integer) from public.static_trips ttr left join public.static_stop_times tr left join public.static_stops ss on tr.stop_id = ss.stop_id on ttr.trip_id = tr.trip_id where ttr.route_id=#{route_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select fir.trip_id, fir.stop_id, fir.shape_id, fir.stop_name, fir.stop_desc, fir.stop_lon, fir.stop_lat, fir.start_date, fir.end_date, fir.arrival_time, fir.departure_time, fir.stop_sequence, cast(sh.shape_dist_traveled as float) from (select ttr.trip_id, tr.stop_id, ttr.shape_id, ss.stop_name, ss.stop_desc, ss.stop_lon, ss.stop_lat, ss.start_date, ss.end_date, tr.arrival_time, tr.departure_time, cast(tr.stop_sequence as integer) from public.static_trips ttr left join public.static_stop_times tr left join public.static_stops ss on ss.stop_id = tr.stop_id on ttr.trip_id = tr.trip_id where ttr.route_id=#{route_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as fir left join public.static_shapes as sh on fir.shape_id = sh.shape_id and fir.stop_lat = sh.shape_pt_lat and fir.stop_lon = sh.shape_pt_lon
